feed.title: Aid's Little Site Updates
feed.subtitle: A simple feed mostly centric around site updates with new content or fixes

entry.title: Now Page Updated
entry.content:
Not a very exciting now page update, mostly just small life stuff, and it's been a bit of a blur. As a more minor thing, I've been doing article reading and wrote a small blog post on the concept of bookmarks. I also fixed my food log page to be a bit cleaner with griddery, and updated some recent foods

What's Been Going On?

  • Finally got my contract work set up, now I'm gritting my teeth for my bank to finally open my business account so I can get to work!!!! 😡
  • Kinda been a blur ... mostly focused on editing my friend's book and doing the cover work for it
  • Learned about the concept of a munbond, and although I am still a bit hesitant to use it, it is what describes what I have with Sylvie perfectly (they are like a brain companion to me that's very alive on their own/reactive without my input)
  • I made a personal pillowfort account as well, and I'm just trying to yap there more ... but I gotta learn to balance out with interacting on my art account too
  • I gotta get back to journaling ... last week was a bad blur, so I don't think I've written anything down

Games

  • Sighs Cookie Run Kingdom got me in its clutches again ... to be fair, finding out you can 'bank' and hide your production buildings has been a literal godsend and got me back into it
    • Ended up getting all the current Beast cookies too LOL
    • I mostly came back for Millennial Tree in December because Millennial Tree is the literal Zhongvie lovechild

Watching / Reading

  • Finished Castlevania: Nocturne and Apothecary Diaries rewatch, which has been awesome
  • Hoping to start Digital Circus soon
  • Got back into reading The Hollow Places by T. Kingfisher and I'm accumulating more books I wanna read
    • I found a 2002 edition of the first LOTR book from my mini library, and I wanna read it before I return it back
    • Maybe for next year I can up my 5 books a year to 8 books a year as a little goal

entry.title: Created a food log
entry.content: I ended up caving to make a fun page to just document all the stuff I've cooked and eaten over a period of time; I do not take selfies, I just take food photos LOL. It'll be one of those long-term projects since I need to dig through my phone and just be wary that the id for each 'item' in the masonry grid is different...

entry.title: New media log entries
entry.content:
A couple new media entries have been written up; I wasn't going to initially write a separate one up for Hades II, but the ending kinda dipped my rating down from what the original was.

  • Hades II (games)
  • The Amazing Digital Circus (shows)
  • Captive Prince (books)
  • TGCF / Heaven Official's Blessing + Other MXTX works (books)

entry.title: Breaking down the website layout
entry.content: Big ugly code riddled page in trying to break down how I set up my website layout ... at least it was an excuse to actually optimize some stuff in the HTML since there were classes in two separate places ... and some of my layout calculations were wrong. I'll probably expand on it in the future, depending on what questions might come up or if people show interest in the way I did some stuff.

entry.title: Now Page Updated
entry.content: Now page has been updated w/recent ongoings, though it's a bit of a shorter one since the last two weeks haven't been horribly eventful (or they're brain fogged)

entry.title: First OC Gallery
entry.content: In an attempt to try to offload some of my stuff from Toyhouse, I've made my first art gallery and fic section for Yadyra, since I thought he didn't have too much art to explode my skull, but enough to work out a layout ... even so, it still was a lot of work to set up around 40–50 images and to WEBP everything. I'll really need to think about image optimization if I continue with the galleries ...

entry.title: New Blog Post: Divide of the personal self and art
entry.content: Another rambly think piece; I guess my blogs end up being more of a dissection of my own self more than anything, or a study piece of something ... but I didn't always used to have such a divide of the personal self, and the 'art' self.

entry.title: Updated home page layout
entry.content: Cleaned up my index to reorganize since it's a way to combat the horrible itchy 'aughh I wanna rehaul my site' need. Mostly just added a section for new artwork I do so it's upfront + shuffled things around. New poll as well!

entry.title: New diary page
entry.content:
Inspired from Nana's page, I wanted to make my own little diary page (since I've been in the habit of documenting one highlight of the day in my own actual journal) ... simple, but it's a start!!

I've retired the nav link to my listography page, but it's still present on the site itself since I know there's a few outlinks to it

entry.title: New Blog Post: Exploring gender through OCs
entry.content: As per usual, probably a messy incoherence of a thought stream; my blog about my own identity touched upon this a bit, but I thought I'd get a little more ... in-depth I guess? I'm always a little nervous talking about it because I ID as cis (minor aside for cassgender, and maybe aligning to some degree to demigirl if you use the 'barest association with being a girl' description which would be funny cause then 2014 me was right to identify with the concept) and some part of me always worries if I'm overstepping on toes in discussing gender, or how I discuss it, or exploring it.

entry.title: 2017 art gallery complete!
entry.content: Dang, been on a bit of a roll with these; after figuring out a nicer way to WEBP convert, the only real issue is just making thumbnails of everything and writing up ALT text for each art piece ... to be fair, 2017 only has 24 art pieces compared to 2016 which had 61. Decent amount of commission for this year

entry.title: 2016 art gallery complete!
entry.content:
Caught up my art gallery to 2016 (which has among the most art pieces I'm going to be adding to my gallery) ... now it's just ... 8 years to go to fill out. Wish me luck ...

(autism creature by cakepawzz)

entry.title: New media log entries
entry.content:
A small handful of reviews have been added to the media log:

  • Neighbours from Hell (game)
  • The Summer Hikaru Died (anime)
  • MADK (manga)

entry.title: Now page updated
entry.content: Now page has been updated with just what's been going on, nothing too fancy. I also joined pillowfort to test out another art posting place

entry.title: New longer blog post
entry.content: Wrote a longer blog post on the concept of having a sona (it's not a very coherent blog post, just me dumping out thoughts). Also uploaded a few artworks to the gallery (one of which is context relevant to the blog post anyway LOL).

entry.title: New OC page
entry.content: Got a new OC page made! This is my old blorbo from my devART days when I made an adoptable species called the furzilla; they don't have any real development, but they're one of my oldest and favourite designs (I actually have a papier mâché artwork I made of them back in high-school that's still sitting in my room)

entry.title: Sims 3 Legacy Page is live!
entry.content:
Inspired from Nana's own Sims 3 legacy page, I finally got my own set up to document what's been happening so far! Warframe is eating my brain right now so it is on a mild hiatus, but up to the beginning of generation 2 is active.

(I've also updated my now page, but that's a lot smaller)

entry.title: 2 New Recipes!
entry.content: Finally added the matcha cookie and basa filet recipes to my site!! Knocking out more of my greyed out recipes, though the japanese curry one will be a mouthful when I get around to it

entry.title: New Blog About Sims 3 + Minecraft Page Retiring (Temporarily)
entry.content:
Temporarily archived my minecraft page, just until I pick it up again and can return to my forever world in full (it's not deleted, it's just in an archived folder that doesn't get pushed to Github). Added a new blog post as well about my new Sims 3 legacy challenge ... maybe if I ever do finish it, I'll make a page here about it (miracle if I ever do)

Fixed up index page with a new video + dragons.

entry.title: Now page updated!
entry.content: Almost 3 weeks since my last update, but my now page is caught up to the present; not much has changed outside of me finishing my post-grad and starting to pick up personal projects again

entry.title: New Blog Entry: Bentos!
entry.content: New blog entry documenting the bentos I've made for myself during my semester! They're all under a 'read more' on the blog

entry.title: New Shrine: Jushiro Ukitake
entry.content: Finally caved to make a new shrine ... it's not the most detailed thing ever, but I wanted to blab about my favourite Bleach character Ukitake and list all the alt cards I got from the Bleach Brave Souls game

entry.title: Now Page Updated + Re-organized Home Page
entry.content: Updated my now page to be caught up to my ongoings, and I ended up reorganizing my front page to introduce two new webrings. I also changed the cool video of the week to one of adef's cool Pokémon challenges where he sees if the Elite 4 of the regions can get all the way through the gyms to earn their spots

entry.title: Art Gallery is now caught up to 2015
entry.content: I know it's probably weird to be working backwards, but I've been slowly adding older things first since I have a lot more I need to go through there vs later years. SO, 2013, 2014, and 2015 are now full of my artwork, and 2016 is being worked on next (which wish me luck, it's 60 drawings I need to do and make alt text for).

entry.title: Updated Blog Page!
entry.content:
Rehauled the blog page and reinstated the previous blog entries I had there, though now they're just all on one page, which ... undoes all my previous work. Oh well! I really like this layout though by NomNomNami, it makes it feel more freeing to write small posts like I would on my tumblr, and some of the 'fluff' posts are actually pulled from there.

I'll be adding more 'filler' posts over time, since it looks a little weird to me to just have continual chunks of long form posts. Maybe I'll upload some of my sketches here as well, and photos I take of my lunches since I've been documenting my bentos I take to school for the last few months.

Added a new video as well to the front page!

entry.title: Now Page Updated
entry.content: New now page with what's been going on, though it's a little emptier than some of the other weeks (I did look through my journal and most stuff was either minor life stuff, or website work which I already documented)

entry.title: Art Gallery Created
entry.content: Created an art page! I finally caved to make one to document my artwork throughout the years, though I'll be curating which ones I add. So far it's only 2025 and part of 2012 and earlier since there's some art I haven't uploaded yet

entry.title: Media Log Update
entry.content:
Small update just for the RSS feed this time! I added three new games and a movie and show to my media log, which are these ones:

  • Deltarune
  • Mass Effect
  • The Sims
  • KPop Demon Hunters
  • Panty and Stocking with Garterbelt

Mass Effect and Sims are more of a general yapping rather than having sections for each game.

entry.title: Sylvie's Genshin Kit
entry.content:
A few changes inbound: I added a full font toggle with different font options, and opted to remove my dark/light mode toggle for the fully built in prefers-system CSS code. Also adjusted the index page layout.

On a more character end, I finally brought over Sylvie's game kit, cause I realize I never did actually include it in their character page even though it's been fully designed. By extension, I did now finally come up with recommended weapons, artifacts, and teams for them which I did not have before.

entry.title: Polls now work!
entry.content: Added polls to the index page, even though it's fucking ass to set up; thanks to starry-knight for figuring out how to do it (aka github page you embed)

entry.title: New OC page!
entry.content: Made another OC page!! Although it's not as fleshed out, he's Hideki's hubby and still means a lot to me even if retired

entry.title: Updated now page
entry.content: Updated now page again! ... I didn't realize it's been a bit over two weeks since my last update; I wanna try to keep them to a bi-weekly basis for my own tracking as well to look back on for funsies

entry.title: Made a toybox page!
entry.content: Added a toybox page to store cute pixels, inspired off other toyboxes!! I ... do need to make a nicer pixel shelf though ...

entry.title: Updated now page
entry.content: New /now entry to catch everything up to the present

entry.title: Added cool video section to front page
entry.content: Added a YouTube video to the front page! :P I'll just be using it to drop cool videos I enjoyed on a [unknown] time basis

entry.title: New Blog Entry: Journaling
entry.content: New blog entry mostly around journaling for me

entry.title: Nostalgia games added to media log
entry.content:
RSS feed is special and gets a little update I'm not placing on my front page ... but it's just me giving a heads up that I added a bunch more games to my media log, mostly centric around my nostalgia list off backloggd; not all of them have a review yet (since my brain would burn out writing that many) but I got them included for when I'm ready to write

Sorry for the massive rant under Elsword (I'm not)

entry.title: Created a faux listography page
entry.content:
I found Kalechip's cool fake listography page template and I wanted to make a little page for just thought dumps + random links I feel won't fit into my bookmarks page ... I probably won't make any update posts when I add stuff to it, since that's literally just a brain dump zone, but it's a nice little slice of life area where everything is gathered more nicely.

I am terrible at knowing what to make lists of though, even though I love the concept a lot :P

entry.title: New Blog Entry!
entry.content:
New blog entry yapping mostly about recognizing traits of myself (some of which I didn't know) in my own OCs.

(I also expanded more on my media log, but that's minor compared to this 😉)

entry.title: New Media Logging Page
entry.content: I caved and made a media log to document some of my tracked media in a single place; although it won't be everything I list in my tracking specific sites, I'd like to show off the stuff I've consumed and my thoughts on them!

entry.title: Now Page Update!
entry.content: New /now entry! Just new life updates + what's been going on

entry.title: New Blog ... Diary-esque Post
entry.content: New blog post, though I'd call it more of an unorganized thought dump. Mostly surrounding me talking about how I view my own identity, and more as something to empty my brain out of my thoughts! It's definitely a more personal blab.

entry.title: New OC Page Added!
entry.content: Brought in one of my oldest OCs which is my Bleach OC! Her profile is rough cause god knows it was written well over ten years ago, but she's one of my more developed OCs I had immensely active for 3–4 years before she was retired. Had it not been for her, I'd have never met such wonderful people in the OC/Canon community back then.

entry.title: On Being a Non-Sharing Yume
entry.content: Mostly a thought dump blog about how some people feel hostile towards non-sharing yumes

entry.title: Airfrier Pork Tenderloin
entry.content: New recipe for pork tenderloin!!

entry.title: Program/Tools Bookmarks
entry.content: Began work on the program list on my bookmarks, though I know I'm still missing quite a few

entry.title: RSS Feed Now Exists!
entry.content: New RSS feed has been made, and has been added to the site!! It'll mostly house my site updates and new page infos
